description: This file defines a React functional component named MessageInput that provides a user interface for inputting and sending message questions regarding company data. It manages input state, handles sending logic, and renders input and button elements.

methods.name: MessageInput({ onSend, loading })
methods.description: React functional component for message input, handling user text input, sending on button click or Enter key, and managing loading state.

methods.name: handleSend
methods.description: Function to trim the input value, invoke onSend callback with the input, and reset input state.
